[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
HUD_TIME
enum HUD_TIME {...}

Flags used by custom time displays.

Values
HUD_TIME_RIGHT_ALIGN

(65536) Draw right aligned element.

HUD_TIME_HOURS

(131072) Draw hours.

HUD_TIME_MINUTES

(262144) Draw minutes.

HUD_TIME_SECONDS

(524288) Draw seconds.

HUD_TIME_MILLISECONDS

(1048576) Draw milliseconds.

HUD_TIME_ZERO_HOURS

(2097152) Draw hours even if the value is zero.

HUD_TIME_FREEZE

(4194304) Freeze the displayed value.

HUD_TIME_COUNT_DOWN

(8388608) Count down.
